A '''block of resin''' is a [[block]] equivalent to nine [[resin clump]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Blocks of resin can be [[instant mining|broken instantly]], regardless of held items, or when under the [[Mining Fatigue]] effect. When broken, it drops itself.
{{Breaking row|Block of Resin|horizontal=1}}

== Usage ==
Because blocks of resin can be broken instantly without any tool, and do not have unusual interactions like [[slime block]], [[honey block]], and [[TNT]], they can be used as a temporary building block that is easy to place and break.<ref>{{tweet|gnembon_mc|1851369514547491006|Finally a good scaffolding/temp block in the game: no side-effects of using/walking/touching it, just a block|October 29, 2024}}</ref>
=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{Crafting usage}}
=== Note Blocks ===
Blocks of resin can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "basedrum" sounds {{in|Java}} or "flute" sounds {{in|Bedrock}}.
